thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com | 2 of 4
thread.title: William A. McCann
thread.title_full: Flologic reviewed by William A. McCann

author: William A. McCann
title: William A. McCann
text:
We had a Flo-Logic installed after having a hot water pipe leak in our crawl space while on vacation. The leak caused warping of hardwood floors, doors, and created mold that had to be professionally removed under the supervision of an environmental engineer.
The device has served us well with the only problem being an occasional shut down when the water softener is working. I have recommended Flo-Logic to all of my friends, family, and real estate business associates.
